recipe:
Gluten Free Taco Mix
2 teaspoon cumin 1 teaspoon paprika 1/2 - 1 teaspoon chilli 1 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt 1 teaspoon oregano 1 teaspoon corn flour 1/4 teaspoon salt
Mix all together and use for 500gms-750gms mince meat or 3 cans of beans (mixed, cannelloni and black beans.) Serve in tacos with your choice of extras ( cheese, avocado, lettuce, tomatoe ect.
)
